content: until corner cs *double_crochet and sl puff in next stitch skip next stitch* repeat to end slipstitch to chain 3 to join 3 double_crochet 50 sl puffs and a chain 2 space round 27- chain 3 double_crochet around until corner cs double_crochet around slipstitch to chain 3 to join cut yarn and weave in ends 105 double_crochet and a chain 2 space you add more row for a larger cowl by repeating row 24-27- on repeating row *make the first double_crochet and sl puff in the 2nd stitch not the same as the starting chain unlike row 26 where it is worked into the same stitch as starting chain * copyright © by pixie hollow yarn designs 2020 please do not alter this pattern or share as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs as the creator of this pattern when possible finishing- you can add fringe or tassels if you have yarn left or leave as is copyright © by pixie hollow yarn designs 2020 please do not alter this pattern or share as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs as the creator of this pattern when possible
